title: Emerald Blossom Vanki - A Timeless Adorable Bangle
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features a vibrant oval-cut Emerald (approximately 1 carat) surrounded by brilliant-cut diamonds (approximately 0.75 carats total weight
features: This exquisite Vanki, or armlet, features an intricate floral design. The central emerald is delicately set within a halo of shimmering diamonds, creating a captivating blossom effect. The bangle has a delicate design, a traditional style reimagined with a modern sensibility. The intricate latticework and delicate settings demonstrate exceptional craftsmanship.
colors: Predominantly gold with a vibrant green emerald at the center
complemented by the sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: and festive occasions such as Sankranthi or Diwali. Can also be worn to upscale parties and special events.
description: A stunning fusion of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The rare oval cut emerald and the precise diamond settings make this vanki a true statement piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and adds to its heirloom quality. Wear a piece of South Indian heritage with confidence and grace.
